name: pubg mobile
desc: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG) is an online multiplayer battle royale game developed and published by PUBG Corporation, a subsidiary of South Korean video game company Bluehole.

name: apex legends
desc: Apex Legends is an online multiplayer battle royale game featuring squads of three players using pre-made characters (called 'Legends'), similar to those of hero shooters. ... Each character in the squad has a unique design, personality, and abilities that provide different playstyles to the team.

name: call of duty warzone
desc: Call of Duty: Warzone is a free-to-play battle royale video game released on March 10, 2020, for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Microsoft Windows. A version for the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S has been announced to be released in 2022, with a mobile version also in development as of 2022.

name: valorant
desc: Riot Games presents VALORANT: a 5v5 character-based tactical FPS where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Valorant is free to play and can run on most low end pc so join the fun.

name: the division 2
desc: Tom Clancy's The Division 2 is an online-only action role-playing video game developed by Massive Entertainment and published by Ubisoft.

name: fortnite
desc: Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017. It is available in three distinct game mode versions that otherwise share the same general gameplay and game engine.
